message:
Hey Sananana,

I drew something for you! Your joining Hololive finally inspired me to flex my creative muscles again. Before that, the last time I drew anything was probably 10 years ago. Of course, I still have a long way to go to reach your level, but you inspire me to try!
Anyway, other than the drawing, I also organized this birthday project. I hope you love it as much as I do! None of this would have been possible without the help and creativity of your Sanallites. So many of them participated in drawing or writing something heartfelt for you; it even made *me* emotional while putting this website together.
Sana, I hope you see the love that all your fans have for you; it's as vast as Jupiter, burns hotter than the sun, and will endure longer than the heat death of the universe. I'm so proud of what you've accomplished in Hololive already, and I can't wait to continue this journey with you, through all the hardships and the good times— no matter what form it takes. To infinity and beyond!

I'm glad you're around. Happy birthday.

With Love,
Joel Z
name: Joel Z (@SanaBeliever)

Happy super ultra unlimited deluxe infinity ultimate HAPPY BIRTHDAY you sweet sweet beeg space cinnamon roll baby SANANANANANA~

You are my first and only Oshi, I will keep supporting you in my way until the heat death. Nah, even the heath death can't stop me! Let's keep going together! message:
So there was this Cartoon Network TV show called Codename: Kids Next Door where the kids from the KND organization clash with various adult villains throughout the series. Some of these instances involve interfering with some goody two-shoe kids called the Delightful Children from Down the Lane. These Delightful Children have numerous birthday cakes per year and never share with anyone but themselves. In one of the episodes, an adult by the name of Father was able to make the Delightful Children's birthday cake into a space station as a parody to Star Wars or any similar sci-fi genre scenario. This roughly made Microsoft Paint image depicts the cake in orbit like that of the cartoon mentioned. I doubt it would be BEEG enough without your limiter, but it's the thought that counts. Another Earth orbit cycle has been fulfilled marking your estimated date of birth.

In other words, Happy Birthday Sana! Here's a space station birthday cake in reference to a mid-2000s cartoon show.
name: @SimK64

message: HAPPY BIRTHDAY SANA!!! I hope you have a great time and eat lots of bread and cake. You are such a wonderful and incredible person that is always herself and doesn't put a mask on. You aren't just a streamer/idol to us, you are part of a family and we all care and love you so much. Keep being the beeg space baby you are cause we all love you for who you are. Have a great birthday and I hope to there are so many more we can celebrate as a family together <3

message: Happy Birthday Sana! My first idea was to rearrange the stars for you, but someone reminded me that Space Australia is in the southern hemisphere and you might not see it, so we decided that wouldn't work. I've been watching Hololive for 3 years now and never really had an oshi, but after watching your debut I finally found mine. Your streams are always fun, from your deeply researched Holoscopes and insane Evil God Korone stream to your relaxing member watchalongs, you're always full of energy. The way you are unyieldingly yourself and do what you want is great and reminds me to do the same. As always, I'm excited to see whatever is next! Thank you for being you Sana, and again, Happy Birthday!
name: Connor G

message:
Happy Birthday Sana!
This is my first time writing to someone I don't really know personally, feels weird.

Your humbleness and kindness always remind me that there are still good in this small, hideous, and unforgiving planet. Your bright personality has absolutely given me the biggest heart boner in the entire galaxy. Your voice is sweeter than any of the sweetest treats spanning all across the universe. Your are the absolute best and I hope you stay with us for a long time. Because you have a community that really loves you. Big or small, numbers don't really matter. We'll always be right here with you, whatever happens. Stay strong, stay BEEG, and most importantly. Stay you.

Lightspeed, BEEG Sana
name: R-Johnson

Thank you for being you!
I started my vtuber journey just before Council debuted and it was your debut stream that was my first full vtuber stream I watched. I was sucked in ever since. I feel I made no mistake as having you as my oshi. I love that you stick to what you want to do, like playing certain games for large amounts of time due to your love for them. Your humour is creative and wonderful too, ranging from a horse birthing stream to silly comments regarding Kirby's arms looking like a certain body part.
I wish you an amazing year ahead and for you to be able to make even more lovely memories with the Hologirls and the Sanallites.

Happy BEEG Birthday to you, Sana!!!

message:
Hey Sana!!

Happy happy birthday to the BEEEGEST cute person I know! I really, really cherish all of the time I’ve spent watching and supporting you throughout this last year. You’ve truly inspired me on many fronts of my life - be it in terms of your creativity, cheerfulness, or just being yourself! I mean it from the bottom of my heart when I say watching you and your streams has provided a wholesome joy that always never fails to cheer me up!

From watching your debut stream, to our first member’s stream creating Neighbula, and to now creating some of my very first fan artwork ever for your birthday, I hope I can continue supporting you from here on out - because I’m excited for everything you do, as always. I’m super happy to be, and I’ll always be proud to be a Sanallite (especially from day one)!

~ FaithCafe ^^
name: FaithCafe

message: A very Happy Birthday to our beloafed Space baby! Sadly I couldn't find the man/womanpower necessary to bake a cake that could house 14 billion candles, but at the very least I did want to leave this message. It's always a joy to watch your streams whenever, wherever, and for whatever amount of time they happen to appear. In all of Space Australia, nay, the entire universe over I don't know of another entertainer who can bring such unrestrained jubilance, dedication and beeg laughs to the task at hand in every stream - even in times of distress (hopefully this message finds you in less pain). Here's to another 14 billion years, and catch you on the next stream! SANANARA!!!
name: Adam

message: Happy Birthday Sana! You and we Sanalites have made lots of good memories since your debut.  Sometimes it feels so one-sided, in that you do so much to bring us joy and warm fuzzies while what we can do in return seems just so much more limited.  But here on your birthday, I hope that we've been able to create gifts for you that show how much we truly appreciate you. Never underestimate the impact you have been making. Wishing you all the joy and love today and everyday! Love, Piriyuuu
name: piriyuuu

message: Happy Birthday Sana! Wish this will be a great year for our BEEG SPACE BABY!
name: 橘吉良/Kira Tachibana

message: Happy birthday Sana! I can't believe it's almost been a year. Just wanted to say, thank you for always being such a ray of sunshine for us Sanalites! We hope that this reaches your amazingly wonderful heart like you have reached ours these past few months~!

message: Happy Birthday Sana! I always have fun watching your streams and really admire your positive attitude and energy. Thanks for all the hours of entertainment so far and I can't wait for plenty more to come.
name: Asphyxelation

message:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY SANA!! It's always so nice to see you bless us with your smile and laughs alongside all us Sanalites. It's thanks to your brimming kindness and joy that so many of us are able to face even our roughest days with a bright smile and a desire to headpat. Never forget how important you are to all of us and that no matter what may come, be it menacing EMMI's, gooey eldritch abominations, or being stranded in a Walmart, we'll always be here by your side enjoying every second with you.

Thank you Sana for being you, the Space Baby we adore with all our doughy hearts!! And here's to your stellar birthday!
name: @MediocreNep

message:
Hi there, Sana! Hope you like the card I made for you. It's a picture of you in an alternate outfit, flying with Togekiss in your very own rocket shoes! I know how much you preferred to wear shoes with rocket launchers on them, so I installed them myself. So with that said, take care and enjoy yourself, have a blessed day, and keep up the great work. And from one fellow Kirby fan to another... 

Happy Birthday, Space Princess! 😉

Your Space Hero, Star Warrior Robby 🌟
name: Star Warrior Robby

message: Happy birthday, Sana!!! I hope that your special day is out of this world! X]
name: Holly (@MistletoesArt)

message: Sana is the BEEG ray of sunshine that I never thought I needed so much in my life! My life has changed drastically in the past year, but watching you smile being yourself really kept my head up forward and to bring out the better of me! It's absolutely wonderful to feel your love towards the Sanallites and in turn we also adore our adorable space baby! Keep on streaming your creative and lovely self - I can truly never get enough of them! Headpats for Sanananana!!!
name: nguyenyuan

message: Happy birthday Sana! I hope you have fun on this, your BEEEG day, and always!
name: Adonais

message: Keep up the good work! I’ll always be in orbit, rooting for you no matter what.
name: @kohauro

message: Happy Birthday Wonderful Space Lady! <3
name: RadCrab

message: SANA. You've been a wonderful influence to my life since your debut, with your sense of humor always giving me a boost in morale. You've slowly driven me to just do things I like for as long as I want to, and always take life a little less seriously. I recently even picked up a tablet to start learning how to draw, so this drawing is my first time. Despite my being a beginner bringing inevitable feelings of self-consciousness, you've made me feel comfortable adding to the efforts the other Sanallites have been putting in to wish you the best of birthdays. And so, happy birthday! We're all looking forward to everything you potentially have in store for us, and you will always have our support for whatever you want to try out. Prepare a beeg cake, take that limiter off and relax, and feel free to blow us all up while you're at it if you can't find a space candle to blow out (the Sun?). Wishing you the best!
name: [YT]Ouraclaude

message: Happy birthday Sana from a sanalite down under
name: Daniel

message:
Words don't express the contributions you've made to this community. With the effort and work put you've put in all your content, and your aura of overwhelming happiness, you've been a constant beam of inspiration and positivity for all of us. And that's not something I say lightly.

Happy birthday Sana, and here's to another year with you and the rest of HoloCouncil!
name: @JGblkshot

message: Happy Birfmas Sana!

name: maiky

message: Happy birthday space baby! Has it already been almost a year? It's crazy to think that so much has happened, yet it feels like no time has passed at all... On your special day I just want to say how much joy your presence brings, even when you're down or when times are hard, you have such a strong heart, finding the strength to show us your smiling face. Even though I can rarely catch your streams, everytime I put one of your vods on, your light and bright personality and your carefree voice puts me at ease. ON top of thAT, being an AMAZING artist and an absolute gamer?? (seriously I don't know anyone who does lighting like you) No matter what happens, you'll always be the coolest space lady to me. You got this Sana!! <333 Wishing you health and happiness for you and your family!
name: Casserol

message: Hey Sana, just wanted to wish you a Happy Birthday!!! It's been a pleasure tuning into your streams and having fun with you and the rest of the Sanalites. I really wanted to thank you for the better half of last year. It was a bit of a rough year for me, but with you and your streams, it made the worst of times a little less harsh, and a little less lonely. The Pokémon streams are among my favorite streams I've ever had the pleasure to be around, which is sayin somethin since, for one, before those streams I was never one to stay in for long streams,  and two, I didn't even know a lot about Pokémon to begin with. They were extremely comfortable and relaxing to listen to. And it just felt so nice to hang out and tune in whenever I could. Anyways, once again just wanted to thank you for all the fun times you shared with us, and just want to wish you a very Happy Birthday. I will always keep supporting you, and I look forward to what's to come in the near future. Sincerely - Brawl Flowers
name: @BrawlFlowers

message:
Happy birthday Sana!
Since your debut. You always seem to be that adorable genius. I've been fascinated by your many aspects. 
-Your Knowledge in Astrology and Astronomy
-Your positivity that shines brighter than the stars
-Your inexplicable ability to make anyone smile

There's this unexplainable aura about you, one that makes feel like you are very much out of this world.
name: WonderfulProgress

message:
To Sana like the sun.
I love your bright, sunny smile that cheers everyone up~♪
I wish you good health and peace in the universe from now on.
name: uranus_4921

message: Happy Birthday, Sana! Thank you for the past 10 months. I knew before your debut that you'd be special and I'm so glad I was right. You are such a wonderful and bubbly person, even during hard times you manage to shine. Have the best day, you deserve it.
name: Ami (@GamerGirlFart)

message: Happy Birthday! Your streams make people smile, so please keep going!
name: XCBDH

message: Happy birthday sanananana! To space we go!
name: Diingle

message:
Hey Sana! Before the message I just want to say A BEEG Happy Birthday to you! From the moment you were announced I already felt positive energy just by looking and I was right. 
You are absolutely a ball of sunshine and rainbows your positive energy and bubbly personality just feels so nice to be around and you make everyone happy with that positivity of yours! So please we want you to keep on smiling and also just keep doing you, don't stress yourself out too much keep doing things in you own pace! I really enjoy your streams it really helps me out when I'm stressed out from tasks. As a clipper my job is to show everyone in the Hololive community or even outside on how amazing and lovely you are and I will do my best to spread the message that YOU are a cute space girl with A BEEG HEART! We Sanallites are always here to support you! 
p.s: enjoy your birthday cake🤩😂
name: [YT]HoloCrumb

message: Happy birthday Sana! I wish you only the best on your special day: having the best time, being treated to the best gifts and memories, and with those you cherish best (oh and the best cake too, especially the cake). Of course, I'm super excited to see this very endearing card sent to you - to space! With a balloon! This is so freaking awesome! But in addition, I'm sure each of the Sanallites will have their own special way of celebrating this occasion with you, our beloved Sana! Don't forget, it's your day and you deserve it!
name: GLC H

message: Happy birthday to the most wholesome Spacestralian, Sana! I've loved watching your streams ever since your debut. I wish you the best in the future. From Pohretra, the Roselia in your PC box.
name: Pohretra
